Class ToolBar

java.lang.Object

      javax.faces.component.UIComponentBase

                  netgest.bo.xwc.components.classic.ToolBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.faces.component.StateHolder, netgest.bo.xwc.components.security.SecurableComponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
EditToolBar, GridNavBar, ToolBarMenuPositions
public class ToolBar
extends ViewerSecurityBase

The ToolBar component menu tool bar inside a viewer. The purpose of this component is to organize buttons (that invoke actions) in groups have have them placed in the same area. To place entries (buttons) in the Toolbar, Menu components should be used Example:

Author:
João Carreira
